summary: The speaker reviews a Charlotte Tilbury mystery makeup box, expressing mixed feelings about its contents. They ordered the box to discover which products are worth purchasing and which are not. The box includes items like a mini Pillow Talk mascara, Magic Body Cream, a sample of the Magic Cream, Hydrator Mist, a Disney collaboration highlighter wand, and a Beautyverse eye palette. While the speaker appreciates the inclusion of some popular Charlotte Tilbury products, they express disappointment at not receiving any lip products, which they find more exciting. Despite this, they conclude that the box provided good value for the price paid.
keywords: makeup mystery boxes, Charlotte Tilbury, Pillow Talk mascara, Magic Body Cream, Magic Cream sample, Hydrator Mist, Disney collaboration, highlighter wand, Beautyverse eye palette, bougie lotion, skincare, lipstick, lip liner, value, upper-middle-of-the-pack
